taskDescription:
What are the odds in favor of an event with probability <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>3</mn>
    <mn>8</mn>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{3}{8}</annotation></semantics></math>?
